testcase.name: Searching for Selenium book
testcase.system-out: Given I am on Amazon Home Page on "browser".................................passed When I enter my search as "Selenium Automation".............................passed And I click enter...........................................................passed Then I should be Presented with a search result page........................passed

testcase.name: Navigate to Selenium book page
testcase.system-out: Given I am the Search Return Result Page on "browser".......................passed When I click on Selenium Automation book link...............................passed Then I should navigate to Selenium book title Page..........................passed And I should see the Price of the Book......................................passed And I should see Add to Cart button.........................................passed

testcase.name: Add To cart
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Selenium tile Page on "browser"...........................passed When I check my Trolley basket..............................................passed And I click on Add To Cart button...........................................passed Then I should see my Selenium book added to cart............................passed And I should see my Trolleybasket with one Added Selenium book..............passed
